description: A Christmas cake recipe made more decadent with the addition of brandy soaked raisins.
name: Brandy Soaked Raisin Christmas Cake with Icing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 220g unsalted butter, keep a small amount for baking tin

recipeInstructions.text: Place the raisins and rum in a bowl, cover and leave in the fridge to soak overnight.
Pre-heat the oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced. In a bowl, combine the flour with the allspice, baking powder and baking soda and mix.
In a mixing bowl, combine the butter with the sugar and golden syrup until fluffy. Crack the eggs into the mixing bowl and mix well.
Incremently sift your dry ingredients into the mixing bowl and combine fully with the raisins and brandy from the fridge.
Now lightly butter a spring bottom baking tin and empty the contents.
Bake your cake in the oven for 35 minutes or until cooked fully through.
Once the cake is cooked, allow to cool before you cover it with your icing. Suggested serving with whipped cream.
